text: buried in snow barely visible this is
the hotel hit by Wednesday night's
Avalanche inside the extent of the
damage is becoming clear what looks like
a reception leading to corridors now
unrecognizable full of snow and debris
up to 20 people were staying in the
hotel rego piano along with seven
members of staff but bad weather meant a
difficult overnight rescue operation
Odelle the hotel was reached at 4:30 in
the morning like courageous men who
faced unbearable situations they reached
a place and saved two people are now
working to bring the means of transport
how difficult to bring on skis in the
early hours of Thursday morning rescue
teams faced snowstorms to get to the
area hit with routes blocked to
emergency vehicles only manpower could
save those trapped one man is led to
safety nearby relatives faced an
agonizing wait for news they were
extracting them from the hotel and
bringing them to hospitals I think but I
don't know because it's impossible for
us to go up others text loved ones
inside urging them to stay calm this
morning conditions in a region that's
already fragile after being hit by a
series of earthquakes has begun to ease
but rescuers believe up to 30 people are
still missing as the extent of this
tragedy begins to unfold Franky McKinley
BBC news
